data.title: MCG
data.desc: Yarra Park access to the Melbourne Cricket Ground, Punt Road Oval and the National Sports Museum located within the MCG

data.title: Tennis Centre
data.desc: Convenient access over foot bridge to Rod laver Area, Melbourne Arena, Margaret Court Arena and the Melbourne Park Tennis Complex/National Tennis Centre

data.title: AAMI Park
data.desc: Premier purpose-built venue for rectangular field sports including Holden Centre, Olympic Park Oval and Gosch's Paddock

data.title: Hotels
data.desc: Nearby Hotel accommodation includes: Mantra on Jolimont, Park Hyatt Melbourne and Pullman Melbourne On the Park

data.title: Yarra River
data.desc: Metropolitan Opera House Lincoln Center Theater New York Philharmonic New York City Ballet The Julliard School
